TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StrongNamePublicKeyBlob extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the public key information (called a blob) for a strong name. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class facilitates the use of strong names for identification purposes.
For a complete description of strong names, see <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] publicKey) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of bytes representing the raw public key data.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with raw bytes of the public key blob.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: An object containing a public key blob.
Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current public key blob is equal to the specified public key blob.
Docs.returns: if the public key blob of the current object is equal to the public key blob of the parameter; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a hash code based on the public key.
Docs.returns: The hash code based on the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Hash functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length, known as hash values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates and returns a string representation of the public key blob.
Docs.returns: A hexadecimal version of the public key blob.
